spec_data.Name: perl-DateTime-Format-DateManip
spec_data.Description:
DateTime::Format::DateManip is a class that knows how to convert between
Date::Manip dates and durations and DateTime and DateTime::Duration
objects. Recurrences are note yet supported.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 10:38:24 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Convert Date::Manip to DateTime and vice versa
